Full product lifecycle (October 2011 to present)

RxKinetics

Full product lifecycle (May 2012 to present)

  • Port of Android application
  • Several design iterations
  • Graph drawing using Core Graphics
  • Real-time error checking
  • State persistence and restoration

Delaunay Triangulator

Class project (March-May 2012)

  • Core graphics drawing
  • Shake-to-reset
  • Random point generation and algorithm measurement
  • Utilizes Jonathan Schewchuk's fast geometric predicate library
